resources.string:
Quick instructions for squash: 1. Configure your ghosting session. 2. Place device approx. 2 m in front of T. 3. Click 'GO!' button.
Full instructions available on github.com/mrksbrg/RacketGhost

RacketGhost v. 1.1 Open Source Ghosting Coach Copyright (c) 2015 Markus Borg under MIT License Please fork, report bugs, and request features
Full instructions available on github.com/mrksbrg/RacketGhost
